Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the "Technical Sergeant Joseph G. Lemm tuition benefit act"
Summary: Enacts the "Technical Sergeant Joseph G. Lemm tuition benefit act" to allow members of the New York state organized militia to receive tuition benefits for certain post-secondary degree programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to tuition benefit incentives for members of the New York state organized militia
